statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-21 \, x^{3} - 27 \, x^{2} + 13 \, x + 17 , 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 2 , 3 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 3 , 6 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 6 , -2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
